text: The 1897 New York Giants season was the franchise's 15th season. The team finished in third place in the National League with an 83-48 record, 9.5 games behind the Boston Beaneaters. == Regular season == === Season standings === === Record vs. opponents === === Roster === {| class="toccolours" style="font- size: 95%;" |- !
